ygData.subject: Re: WnS
ygData.msgSnippet: I fought one night before last.  I would guess from his con he was lvl 18-19.  I was level 22 then yet I survived with 12 HP s left.  They are tough little
ygData.messageBody:
I fought one night before last. I would guess from his con he was lvl
18-19. I was level 22 then yet I survived with 12 HP's left. They are
tough little buggers.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Whitcraft,David [SMTP:DWHITCRAFT@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 9:35 AM
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] WnS
>
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> What area are werewolves in? I've seen one and heard of someone
> fighting one
> other in West Commons. Any other areas? Also, about what level are
> they?
> I've heard about 18-20th.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sandeep Shekar [mailto:sandeep@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 6:05 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] WnS
>
>
> From: Sandeep Shekar <sandeep@...>
>
> >Lupine Claw Gauntlets
>
> Quest for Karg Icebear. Kill a werewolf, take werewolf claws (if they
> popped) to Karg Icebear in Everfrost and pay him 75pp and he'll make
> them
> for you.
>
> >Thick Leather Apron
>
> Undead barkeep in unrest.
>
